articles.description: In a 2,200-word screed, Penn excoriated two alleged employees of his nonprofit who had criticized working conditions at Dodger Stadium.
articles.content: According to a new report from the Los Angeles Times, on Friday night, employees of the nonprofit Community Organized Relief Effort (CORE) opened their emails to find a 2,000-plus-word email from the… [+2540 chars]

articles.title: Merck's Frazier, biopharma's irreplaceable voice, to step down as CEO - STAT
articles.description: Frazier reanimated a fabled U.S. drug maker, but also been a leading voice for the entire biopharmaceutical industry.
articles.content:
Kenneth Frazier is stepping down as the CEO of Merck, leaving a giant hole in the fabric of the pharmaceutical industry.
The decision, announced Thursday, has been telegraphed for more than a year, … [+5797 chars]

articles.title: Debunking the biggest misconceptions that are stopping some women from getting COVID-19 vaccine - CBS This Morning
